divs: Sighting Detailswhile I was driving to work during the middle of the first full week of march I was driving past wild waters on silver springs bulevard. I noticed a strange object in the distance. It was muggy outside and the sky around the city had an orange hue reflecting the streetlights from the moisture in the air. looking at the object, I noticed that even thoug it was so humid outside, the object was a perfect triangle (three 60 degree angles) and it had three glowing lights near the corners ofthe triangle. although it had three lights glowing on the object, there was no illumination of the triangle. it was all black besides those lights. it was floating lazily twards the local airport. it had no flashing or landing lights. i saw it for approximately three minutes until the tree line obscured the object and i arrived at work. i felt a little nervous at the time but more of amazement than fear. I was going to write in sooner but was afraid to be ridiculed, but witholding the sighting I realized made me part of the problem than the solution.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Ocala
There were no other sightings in Ocala on or around March 5th 2008
